task.summary: Added validation for the restaurant creation page. Now the name, address, delivery time and tags have to be entered before the restaurant details are saved
Added validation to check if the restaurant name already is entered in the database. If it does the restaurant will not be created and an error will be shown
Added currency formatting to the price so that it shows two decimal places.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Added currency formatting to the price so that it shows two decimal places.

MESSAGE.value: Added validation for the restaurant creation page. Now the name, address, delivery time and tags have to be entered before the restaurant details are saved
Added validation to check if the restaurant name already is entered in the database. If it does the restaurant will not be created and an error will be shown
